author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GIL CONTINUES TO WEAKEN OVER COOLER WATERS... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL LATE SUNDAY...
summary: ...GIL CONTINUES TO WEAKEN OVER COOLER WATERS... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL LATE SUNDAY... As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Aug 02 the center of Gil was located near 20.1, -133.7 with movement WNW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GIL CONTINUES TO WEAKEN OVER COOLER WATERS... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME POST-TROPICAL LATE SUNDAY... title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gil (EP2/EP072025)
